node.description: Layers of palm fronds line the hard packed earthen floors while bed-rolls are placed haphazardly about the room. The cloying scent of citrus candles and moldering canvas hangs heavy in the oppressive heat of this small and dimly lit space.

node.name: Tent, Sleeping Quarters
node.description: Undefinable shapes move in slithery patterns over the dank canvas walls while the distinctive *thwap* of large insects hitting the ceiling of the tent keep up a steady staccato rhythm. Tidy cots, each hung with its own mosquito netting, line either side of the room. Flickering candlelight from the many insect-repelling candles set about the room give off meager light and fill the air with their pungent aroma.

node.name: Taisidon Bait 'n' Tackle
node.description: Huge chunks of bamboo have been cut and hollowed out, forming small barrels scattered about the room. The pungent smell of dead fish mixes with less identifiable odors to create a somewhat overpowering stench. A dog-eared, water-spotted, and odiferous catalog rests on a tall barrel, next to a fish-weighing scale and a badly scrawled blackboard, while additional items are on display upon the nearby racks.

node.name: Island Interiors
node.description: Bamboo poles stand upright, close together and bound with reeds to form light but sturdy walls. A curtained doorway leads to the left, the carved wooden beads of the curtain clicking softly against each other with every movement. To the right, an open arch has been cut into the wall. At the back of the room a wide window looks out to a green and flowering garden, the opening covered with ivory gauze curtains. A neatly dressed clerk stands ready to be of assistance.

node.name: Island Interiors
node.description: Warm and close, the light is dim in this room, the closely lashed bamboo enclosing a quiet dark space. High on the walls, narrow shelves hold sweet-scented beeswax candles, which burn steadily day and night, while scattered between them lie saucers containing smoldering cones of sandalwood incense. The floor is covered with layers of braided sea grass mats in muted tones of green, which muffle the sound of footfalls. A sleepy clerk blinks meditatively in one corner.

node.name: Island Interiors
node.description: Open and airy, large windows at either end of this square room allow the island breezes carrying the rich, spicy scents of tropical flowers and plants to flow through. Gauzy hangings draped over long rods fastened to the walls billow gently in the currents of air, while large potted ferns and palms reflect the wealth of brilliant greenery outside. A dreamy-eyed clerk gazes out the window absently.

node.name: Trading Post
node.description: A conglomeration of scraps of wood is mistakenly viewed as walls in this ramshackle shop. Precarious piles of crates and boxes, filled with trade goods, lean against each other along crooked aisles. The oppressive stench of rancid oils and a fouled larder fills the air.

node.name: Trading Post, General Store
node.description: Everything from precious heirlooms to useless junk fills several wooden crates stacked along each wall. An odd-looking crate sticks out from in between two others and is filled with curious looking items confiscated from the natives.

node.name: Trading Post, Gem Dealer
node.description: Gems of many sizes and types are sorted into several wooden barrels along the wall. An odd looking Elothean stands behind the counter appraising each gem that is handed to him, then cautiously puts it in the proper barrel in exchange for some coins.

node.name: Trading Post, Furrier
node.description: Dead animal pelts and other parts are strewn haphazardly around the room in several piles. Shelves are filled to overflowing with tusks from different exotic animals and an odd stench fills the air, but it doesn't seem to bother Brothos, the little Dwarven furrier.

node.name: Taisidon Skin Art
node.description: Small but comfortable, the sparseness of the furnishings is contrasted by the busy walls of the stall. Each curved surface is covered with parchments depicting the various tattoo designs available and tiled with large mosaics of the designs. Next to an oddly shaped bench rests a table covered with jars of various colors and needles of varying sizes, with a shh'oi paguur skull serving as a centerpiece.

node.name: Everyday and Someday, Front Room
node.description: While functional, nothing in this room is particularly elegant. A pine counter stands against one wall holding accessories while two mannequins are set at either end with clothing on display.

node.name: Everyday and Someday, Formal Room
node.description: Highly polished luxurious hardwoods cover every inch of this space from the floors to the ceilings. Against one wall stands a heavy ironwood counter holding accessories while two wicker mannequins are set at either end with clothing on display.

node.name: Packrat's Piece of Paradise
node.description: Containers literally surround you in this booth, as used and battered ones have been sewn together to make a crude patched shelter in which to sell goods. A few lanterns of different types hang on drawstrings from various bags on the ceiling.

node.name: Imperial Imports
node.description: In a sharp contrast to the rest of the island, this shop is decorated with the finest materials from across the lands. Rich blue velvet covers the cushioned walls, stretching from the mahogany floor to the ceiling. A cured and polished cypress counter stands along a far wall, while fully-armored mannequins are spaced throughout the elegant shop.

node.name: Elegant Etchings
node.description: Narrow bamboo paneling encloses this room, while the floor and ceiling are both covered with a layer of palm leaves. A wide counter stands along one wall, decorated with a garland of flowers.

node.name: Guava Glory
node.description: Every surface in this small, rounded hut is painted a bright guava pink with light green accents. Statues of a smiling Human woman holding bowls of ripe guavas line the walls, their bases acting as pots for various pink and green flora.

node.name: Onwifa's Jewels, Showroom
node.description: Blue silk tapestries cover the walls and slowly undulate in the hot breezes. The dirt floor has been dusted with white sand containing mica chips that lend it quite a festive air. Short poles have been hammered into the floor and their flattened tops are being utilized as display counters.

node.name: Commotion!
node.description: Bells of all shapes and sizes hang all around this small room. A large sign hangs over the back counter, lit by reflected light from all the metal surfaces.

node.name: Mahchoe's Men's Shop, Front Room
node.description: Grime-covered lanterns hang from hooks, barely illuminating the room but filling it with a strong smoky scent. The loud sound of feet hitting wooden slats of the floor is common as attendants move from display to display, performing various activities. Chests, shelves and racks are placed about the area, while twin wardrobes flank the doorway leading out.

node.name: Mahchoe's Men's Shop, Back Room
node.description: A strong scent of oil and rust fills the air. Racks line the walls while tables fill the center of the room. Oblivious to the smell are a few attendants who move about the room, helping the occasional customer and polishing various shields and armor.

node.name: Mahchoe's Men's Shop, Weaponry
node.description: A vague haze hangs in the air from the smoke-stained lantern overhead. Various racks and stands surround the small room with a variety of weaponry, restocked and polished by the occasional attendant.

node.name: Well
node.description: The village well stands surrounded by a plot of croton bushes, low grass curling up around the ancient structure's carefully-laid stones. The oval-shaped well is almost overflowing with fresh and clear water, the surface rippling in a light, warm breeze. Just nearby is the village green, pebbled paths running through the village in several directions.

node.name: Ker'Iala Tavern
node.description: Woven grass matting covers the highly-polished wood plank floor. The bamboo framed parchment walls slide open to bring light and a little respite from the humid surroundings. Large overhead fans rotate slowly, sending a slight sultry breeze throughout the tavern. Palm trees stand between the tables, allowing privacy to the individual tables.

node.name: Toys From Sand, Counter
node.description: By no stretch of the imagination could this small stand ever be described as being well constructed. Bent nails cross over one another at key points and provide plenty of evidence of multiple failed attempts before managing to get a single, securing one properly hammered in. Splashes of different colors decorate the structure, though much of it is faded and peeling from long exposure to the weather. The counter is low, and a single small table rest alongside it.

By no stretch of the imagination could this small stand ever be described as being well constructed. Bent nails cross over one another at key points and provide plenty of evidence of multiple failed attempts before managing to get a single one properly hammered in. Splashes of different colors decorate the structure, though much of it is faded and peeling from long exposure to the weather. The counter is low, and a single small table rests alongside it.

node.name: Clothing Shop
node.description: Brightly colored clothing made from rich silks, sheer gauzes and an array of other fabrics is displayed prominently on various surfaces around the shop. The tropical influence here is strong and seems to have reached every detail of the decor, from the bamboo flooring and the dried palm fronds adorning the ceiling to the mural-painted walls depicting lush jungle vegetation. A heavy floral scent fills the air, undercut by just a hint of ocean breeze.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Gash
node.description: A deep chasm breaks the rocky surface of the path in two. The remains of a rope bridge hang forlornly against the far side of the gash, the connecting planks reaching nearly to the bottom of the chasm. Several trees grow at haphazard angles over the chasm, some reaching almost to the other side.

node.name: Gash, Tree Trunk
node.description: The bottom of the gash is cloaked in smoky shadows that occasionally belch forth noxious fumes. The length of the tree trunk stretches across the gash to the north. The southern edge of the chasm is within easy reach.

node.name: Gash, Tree Trunk
node.description: The bottom of the gash is cloaked in smoky shadows that occasionally belch forth noxious fumes. The midway point of the tree trunk lies to the north.

node.name: Gash, Tree Trunk
node.description: The bottom of the gash is cloaked in smoky shadows that occasionally belch forth noxious fumes. The trunk of the tree sways slightly at the midway point, unsettled by the slightest gust of wind.

node.name: Gash, Tree Trunk
node.description: The bottom of the gash is cloaked in smoky shadows that occasionally belch forth noxious fumes. The midway point of the tree trunk lies to the south.

node.name: Gash, Tree Trunk
node.description: The bottom of the gash is cloaked in smoky shadows that occasionally belch forth noxious fumes. The length of the tree trunk stretches across the gash to the south. The northern edge of the chasm is within easy reach.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Gash
node.description: The resinous scent of crushed pine needles fills the air. Fuzzy green branches, part of a tree which spans the large chasm to the south, partially block the rocky mountain path as it wends its way northward. A small nest lies crumpled beneath one branch.

node.name: Gash
node.description: The sheer walls of the gash rise to either side, several hundred feet high. Scores of dead bodies litter the ground, their armor and weapons rusted with age. The remains of the rope bridge stretch up the side of stone walls.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: A small beach nearby offers a place to rest and regroup at the foot of the South Tower, which rises from the narrow strip to the crater rim far, far overhead. The wall of the lagoon curves smoothly southward and westward, declining as it approaches the open western side, like the rim of a bowl tilted toward the west.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: Although you are directly west of the water gate, the strong outflow from the river makes swimming up to the gate itself impossible. The same currents that aided your passage into the lagoon bar that exit.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: A small strip of land lies at the base of the North Tower, which looms over the little beach like the upraised arm of a giant. The wall of the lagoon curves smoothly northward and westward at the level of the giant's forearm, sloping down toward the open western side.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: The high crater wall stretches east and west, shielding the lagoon against northerly storms. The faintest ribbon of green lies upon the rim high above.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: Here at the lowest part of the crater wall, foam washes a slim crevice just above the waterline. Scarring on the sides of the crevice shows that something was once wedged within, perhaps as a handhold or a step to help mount to the crater's rim.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: The water at the western end of the lagoon roils like the wrath of Drogor. The waves crash through the gap, thrown through the narrow breach in the crater wall. Foam spins high into the air as the surf roars against the rock to either side. Maybe a shark or dolphin could make headway against that tide, but nothing with legs could do it.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: The crater wall rises high and straight from the water, curving to the north. It may not be smooth as glass, but it is sheer enough to defeat any attempt, no matter how skillful, aided only by bare hands.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: The forbiddingly high crater wall stretches east and west, a bastion that protects the lagoon against southerly storms. Hardly a seam or crack mars the black surface, which looks almost polished, reflecting light deep into the water.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: Here in the center of the lagoon, shoved back and forth by wayward currents, one could appreciate the exactness of nature's architecture, if the waves left any time for contemplation. These waves that exhaust and defeat the swimmer would scarcely bother a ship sheltered from the ocean storm in this generous harbor.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: Currents sweep and swirl from every direction here at the heart of the lagoon. A bird in a storm must feel the same helplessness before vast and impersonal powers that take no more notice of a man than of a minnow.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: Oysters have colonized a crease or wrinkle in the bottom of the crater, patiently opening and closing in a unison of mindless feeding. No doubt they hold their own mysteries within their unknown purpose, like a lustrous pearl inside a dark shell.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: The base of the towers and the lower grill waver dimly through the water to the east. A few plants on the floor of the lagoon find an insecure hold in pockets of silt caught within the rubble.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: Far below in the blue-green waters of the lagoon, some curious objects are just visible: a series of perfectly round boulders. These frozen bubbles are a mute witness to the long-forgotten birth of the island in fire and smoke when it rose from the sea in layer upon layer of ash and lava.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: Sea water surges through the gap in the crater rim, making any further westward movement impossible. A swimmer beyond that gap would risk being battered to death against the crater walls by wave after crashing wave. The salt water is cleaner, though, and the rubble on the bottom is clearly visible.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: Outside the grill, the strong flow of the river has scoured the bottom clean, and rocks fallen from the crater walls cover the basin floor. Silt in the water makes it hard to see in any direction, and the current flows powerfully westward.

node.name: Corsair Lagoon, In the Lagoon
node.description: The force of the current is checked dramatically as tide and stream strive for mastery. The ocean pushes its way toward shore one moment only to be pushed back by the river in the next. The muddy flow from the river still clouds the water, obscuring vision in every direction.

node.name: Miskvar's Home, Bamboo Grove
node.description: Crickets chirp and sing to one another from the cool, moist shadows of this cozy enclave. A stacked-stone dwelling with a sculpted thatch roof is encircled by stands of bamboo, concealing the presence of the home from those traveling along the footpath beyond the dense vegetation.

node.name: Taisidon Bait 'n' Tackle, Alcove
node.description: A ragged area rug peeks out from tables, shelves, racks and other bits of furniture La'uaro uses to store surplus wares in. A series of racks, however, has items tagged with prices. A thin layer of dust covers everything, but it's unclear if it's from the sand-filled breezes of the area or just simply having been forgotten for quite some time.

node.name: Once Fine Cutlery, Front Room
node.description: Surrounded by walls covered with gouges and nicks, the dusty sales floor stretches across the room and is littered with broken cutlery, and shattered flatware. A few cabinets that likely once displayed the wares stand bare and empty, their doors either broken or left ajar.

node.name: Once Fine Cutlery, Storage
node.description: A minefield of glass and ceramic litters the floor as far as the eye can see. A thin layer of dust rests atop the majority of the broken furniture, as though nothing has been disturbed for some time. The faint smell of sulfur fills the room, drawing the eye towards several large scorch marks along the walls.

node.name: The Painted Barn, Tools and Trade
node.description: Pervaded with atrophy, the burned walls barely form any real barrier to keep out the elements. As a result, mold has begun to grow along edges of the room, and a noxious odor wafts through the air. Bits of metal and wood litter the floor, waiting to be claimed by the growing mold.

node.name: The Painted Barn, Tack and Gear
node.description: Mold spreads along the charred walls, giving the blackened wood a rotten, white and green hue in several spots. Clearly once meant for the displaying of tools, empty and rusted hooks line the walls and overlook the littered floor.

node.name: Under the Mountain, Entrance Cave
node.description: Jumbled rocks and boulders block most of the light entering the narrow mouth of this cave. A worn path threads between the obstructions further into the gloom.

node.name: Under the Mountain, Passage
node.description: The passage widens slightly as it delves deeper into the mountain. Jagged limestone stalactites loom above, like gnawed finger bones waiting for someone to snatch.

node.name: Under the Mountain, Passage
node.description: Twisting between some enormous boulders, the faint path winds its way deeper under ground. Gaping voids in the ceiling show where the slabs originated from.

node.name: Under the Mountain, Passage
node.description: Long and narrow, this passage continues into the darkness leaving only glowing moss as the light source. The sound of dripping water echoes against the granite walls and pebbles groan under foot. Rank odors waft in the air and assail the senses.

node.name: Under the Mountain, Passage
node.description: The passage opens into a round, spacious room. Sharp, glinting rock walls make an impenetrable cage were it not for the continuing passage.

node.name: Under the Mountain, Passage
node.description: Twisting like a snake, the corridor of rock leads further into the heart of the mountain. The path is hardly wide enough for a gnome to tread and pointed rocks lie silently in wait of a flailing arm or leg. Pebbles from the ceiling bounce against the rocks and land loudly on the ground.

node.name: Tildi's Flowers, Tropical Topiary
node.description: Sturdy jambu trunks are used as the structure of this small space, their surfaces sanded and polished to a soft shine. Panes of crystal-like glass fill out the area in between the shafts of wood. A single live tree sits in a huge blue glass pot in the middle of the hut, juicy jambu fruit hanging temptingly from its branches. Its form follows the curving outline of the building and its large leaves almost hide the twin woven baskets that hang from its limbs.

node.name: Herbalist
node.description: Immaculately scrubbed, there isn't a speck of dirt upon the floor or any dust covering the shelves of this tiny shop. The glass vials lining the shelves are scrupulously clean, their bright colors and fresh labels emphasizing the air of newness in the room.

node.name: Herbalist, Back Room
node.description: Cramped between two narrow walls, a tall glass-paneled cabinet occupies most of the available space in this cupboard-sized room. Blackened by an old acid burn, a pitted patch of scarred wood is partially covered by a braided wool floor mat. A round window is set near the ceiling of one side wall, and opposite, a partially used candle rests on a twisted iron holder.

node.name: Wagon Interior, Jisi's Raffles
node.description: The curving walls of the wagon are painted with an elaborate pattern of blue and green waves, swirling in bright hues that easily reflect the light of the hanging lanterns. A wide granite counter sits upon this side of a pure white curtain dividing the cabin's interior space into two rooms, preventing the casual peruser from seeing the cache of prizes beyond.

node.name: Work Wagon, Waiting Room
node.description: Bright light is emitted from clusters of colored candles scattered around the room. The walls are entirely unadorned save for a few tiny holes, likely natural to the wood itself. Lining each wall are several small wooden benches for those waiting to be spoken to. A small wooden archway set into one wall leads back out, while a curtain covered in several strands of exotic beads leads deeper into the wagon.

node.name: Jetto's Toys, Under the Awning
node.description: A canvas awning in bright stripes of red, yellow and blue flaps and flutters overhead. A young Dwarf stands ready to help customers, lingering next to a low wooden table covered with toys.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Winding Path
node.description: Well hidden among the thickets and thistles of the island, the nearly invisible trail is a barely traveled place between the heavy trees and foliage. Walls made from trees and dense vines rise up on either side of the narrow cleared area. The path has the feel of a shortcut, and appears to have been forged recently, with fresh cuts of sharp instruments still visible in the local flora.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Winding Path
node.description: Well hidden among the thickets and thistles of the island, the nearly invisible trail is a barely traveled place between the heavy trees and foliage. Walls made from trees and dense vines rise up on either side of the narrow cleared area. The path has the feel of a shortcut, and appears to have been forged recently, with fresh cuts of sharp instruments still visible in the local flora.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Winding Path
node.description: Well hidden among the thickets and thistles of the island, the nearly invisible trail is a barely traveled place between the heavy trees and foliage. Walls made from trees and dense vines rise up on either side of the narrow cleared area. The path has the feel of a shortcut, and appears to have been forged recently, with fresh cuts of sharp instruments still visible in the local flora.

node.name: Jalren'rae'Taisidon, Winding Path
node.description: Well hidden among the thickets and thistles of the island, the nearly invisible trail is a barely traveled place between the heavy trees and foliage. Walls made from trees and dense vines rise up on either side of the narrow cleared area. The path has the feel of a shortcut, and appears to have been forged recently, with fresh cuts of sharp instruments still visible in the local flora.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Palisade Gates
node.description: Thick slabs of roughly hewn wood securely fastened by stout diagonal battens of a darker wood make up the double massive entry gates. Centered in the line of logs spearing imposingly into the sky, the gates resemble a dark squared gem set in the thick band of the defensive palisade circle.

The orange light of the guttering torches casts a sooty, wavering light up the smooth barricade of the immense double doors of the entrance gates set centrally in the thick band of the log palisade spearing imposingly into the sky.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Palisade Path
node.description: Spearing imposingly into the sky, the thick logs of the palisade forbid any intrusion into the compound. The faint trail patrols the length of the wall, apparently beaten into the lush grasses by the inhabitants' feet as they scrutinize any possible breach in the security of the logs.

Spearing imposingly into the night, the thick logs of the palisade forbid any intrusion into the compound. The faint trail patrols the length of the wall, apparently beaten into the lush grasses by the inhabitants' feet as they scrutinize any possible breach in the security of the logs.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Palisade Path
node.description: Spearing imposingly into the sky, the thick logs of the palisade forbid any intrusion into the compound. The faint trail patrols the length of the wall, apparently beaten into the lush grasses by the inhabitants' feet as they scrutinize any possible breach in the security of the logs.

Spearing imposingly into the night, the thick logs of the palisade forbid any intrusion into the compound. The faint trail patrols the length of the wall, apparently beaten into the lush grasses by the inhabitants' feet as they scrutinize any possible breach in the security of the logs.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Palisade Path
node.description: Spearing imposingly into the night, the thick logs of the palisade forbid any intrusion into the compound. The faint trail patrols the length of the wall, apparently beaten into the lush grasses by the inhabitants' feet as they scrutinize any possible breach in the security of the logs.

node.description: Spearing imposingly into the night, the thick logs of the palisade forbid any intrusion into the compound. The faint trail patrols the length of the wall, apparently beaten into the lush grasses by the inhabitants' feet as they scrutinize any possible breach in the security of the logs.

The faint trail patrols the length of the wall, apparently beaten into the lush grasses by the inhabitants' feet as they scrutinize any possible breach in the security of the logs.

node.description: Spearing imposingly into the night, the thick logs of the palisade forbid any intrusion into the compound. node.description: Spearing imposingly into the night, the thick logs of the palisade forbid any intrusion into the compound. node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Palisade Path
node.description: Spearing imposingly into the night, the thick logs of the palisade forbid any intrusion into the compound. The faint trail patrols the length of the wall, apparently beaten into the lush grasses by the inhabitants' feet as they scrutinize any possible breach in the security of the logs.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Palisade End
node.description: Spearing imposingly into the sky, the thick logs of the palisade forbid any intrusion into the compound. The faint trail patrols the length of the wall, apparently beaten into the lush grasses by the inhabitants' feet as they scrutinize any possible breach in the security of the logs.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Storage Hut
node.description: Constructed near the looming logs of the palisade, a three-sided hut crammed with hides, food storage, and tribal crafts is shaded from the heat of the day by the softly waving fronds of a gum tree. The area before the hut has been paved with broad flat stones, forming a patio holding the heat of the sun in the rock.
Close by the looming logs of the palisade a three-sided hut crammed with hides, food storage, and tribal crafts is half hidden in the dusky shades of night.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Swamp Bay Commons
node.description: Centered at an angle across this corner of the commons, a long grass hut lounges amid the almost painful neatness of the area. Crossing diagonal traces in the swept dirt suggest this area may be used in the training of warriors, as do the grass-stuffed forms of training dummies leaning against the hut. The sharp spice from the swamp bay at the center of the commons does little to allay the mingled ancient smells of sweat and blood that have permeated the ground.

The scent of a thick savory stew spills from the large pot briskly simmering on the large cooking fire blazing near a long grass hut angled across the clearing, combining with the sharp tang of spice emanating from the large swamp bay centered in the commons. The light from the blazing fire throws the painful neatness of the clearing before the hut into sharp relief, giving enough light to pick out swirls in the neatly swept dirt and easily see the stern neatness surrounding this corner.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Swamp Bay Commons
node.description: An ill-tended grass hut slouches in the far corner of a scruffy clearing, scatters of wood chips and carving curls littering the area before the entrance. The shaggy reddish bark of the swamp bay in the center of the clearing scents the air with a sharp spice aroma as welcome shade flutters under the broad leaves moving restlessly in the slightest breeze from the gnarled branches tangling overhead.

A rejected carving of a small owl smolders dejectedly in the tiny night fire. Surrounded by the sharp tang of spice drifting from the huge swamp willow in the center of the commons, an ill-tended grass hut slouches in the darkest corner. The only evidence of habitation is the scatter of wood chips and carving curls liberally littering the area before the entrance of the hut.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Swamp Bay Commons
node.description: A spartan grass hut boldly claims this corner of the commons. The ground is fastidiously cleared of every weed, the remaining vegetation militarily neat under the spreading boughs of the swamp bay. The clean spice scent of the tree anoints the air as the welcome shade flutters from the broad leaves moving restlessly in the slightest breeze from the gnarled branches tangling overhead.

A spartan grass hut boldly claims this corner of the commons. The ground is fastidiously cleared, the remaining vegetation militarily neat. A clean spice scent anoints the air as an evening breeze flutters restlessly through the broad leaves of the gnarled swamp bay. The embers of a small cooking fire glow in the darkness, painting this corner of the clearing in a weak illumination.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Swamp Bay Commons
node.description: The plump rotund grass hut squats in cheerful squalor surrounded by a neglected rock garden, the scent of the minute purple and white violets peeking up from the vine-twined rocks competing with the sharp spiciness of the swamp bay holding court from the center of the clearing. Welcome shade flutters from the broad leaves moving restlessly in the slightest breeze from the gnarled branches tangling overhead.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Abandoned Hut
node.description: The relentless humidity and heat have taken their toll on the dilapidated hut sagging dispiritedly in the overgrown clearing at the end of the path. Shunned by its neighbors, the structure is prevented from total collapse only by the sturdy trunks of the palisade against which it now leans.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, West Ward
node.description: The barren ground continues to the bend of the stockade before curving in on itself, bearing evidence of the vigilant guards who have worn the ground down to bare earth. Beyond the barren ground a cluster of grass huts can be seen to the north.

The barren ground continues to the bend of the stockade before curving in on itself, bearing evidence of the vigilant guards who have worn the ground down to bare earth. Beyond the barren ground small flickering night fires are visible from the north.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Interior Gates
node.description: Just within the gates a broad expanse of hard-beaten earth runs in either direction along the stockade wall. The faint chatter of village life drifts sporadically from the north.
Two massive torches flare brilliantly on either side of the gate, washing the barren area in a flickering orange hue. In the dim light, night fires are visible clustering to the north on either side.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Central Ward
node.description: Hard-packed ground barren of any vegetation forms a protective necklace separating the sprawl of vulnerable huts and gardens from the defensive stockade. Below, the massive gates mark the main entrance into this haven from the wilderness.

A defensive band of hard-packed earth curls around the southern end of the vulnerable village, leaving sufficient room for guards to patrol the stockade or warriors to mass if danger threatens. On the far side of the beaten ground, the flicker of small night fires strives to ward away the evils that stalk the night.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, East Ward
node.description: The barren ground continues to the bend of the stockade before curving in on itself, bearing evidence of vigilant guards who have worn the ground down to bare earth. Beyond the barren ground, a cluster of grass huts can be seen to the north.

The barren ground continues to the bend of the stockade before curving in on itself, bearing evidence of the vigilant guards who have worn the ground down to bare earth. Beyond the barren ground, night fires flicker from the north.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Sweet Bay Commons
node.description: Sharp shards of broken crockery lie in an untidy pile behind the stout conical hut surrounded by heaped piles of colored dirt. Dappled shade washes over all from the broad branches the bay tree spreads in a protective parasol from the hub of the clearing, bringing the illusion of relief from the oppressive heat.

The embers of a small cooking fire glow in the darkness, throwing a weak illumination over the stout conical hut. The heaps of clay and dirt surrounding the hut take on fantastical shapes that seem to slink just out of clear vision in the uneven light.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Sweet Bay Commons
node.description: A pile of neatly trimmed branches is stacked by the curved wall of a well-tended conical hut. The sweet scent of bay wafting from the thick gnarled tree commanding the center of the commons competes with the astringent odor of rendering dye slowly simmering over the cooking fire.

A small cooking fire casts a wavering illumination over the well tended ground and prosperous hut in this corner of the clearing. Stacked neatly at the rear of the hut, a pile of neatly trimmed branches waits in readiness to feed the flickering flames.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Sweet Bay Commons
node.description: Halved logs have been set as a base to hold a complicated arrangement of woven reeds and branches being used as a drying rack. Rows of halved coconut shells, each neatly hollowed out, are inverted on the rack to cure. Following a rough arc, a wide fire blazes busily under a pot of furiously boiling water by a narrow conical hut.

The cooking fire burns brightly in this corner of the commons, brilliantly illuminating the narrow shaft of the conical hut and the wide drying rack flanking it on either side. The smell of simmering herbs strongly permeates the shadows from the velvet darkness within the hut.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Sweet Bay Drums
node.description: Spread under the shady branches, several large bamboo segments are in varying stages of being hollowed out. A few wood-handled implements that appear to be used for scooping the pulp from the bamboo lie on the ground in front of an oval hut. As quiet as the area is now, the entire jungle will know when these drums are finished.

Sweetbay branches dispel a bit of the omniscient heat of the jungle as they sway in the night breeze. Their lazy movement creates silent shadows that chase each other around large, partially hollowed, bamboo segments in front of the oval hut. As darkness caused the day's labor to cease, the tools used to fashion the drums were dropped and scattered on the ground where they wait to trip the unwary.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Ring Commons
node.description: Lush myrtle surrounds the central plaza in a broad collar, offering a natural cushion for the comfort of any observer of the rituals performed at the hub. The feet of ecstatic dancers have tramped a trio of paths around the ring, forming a strangely pleasing braided pattern of brown embossed among the glossy green leaves.

Light thrown from the sooty torches blazing about the hub wavers over the lush myrtle of the commons ringing the central area, creating an illusion that the trampled braided paths made by the feet of ecstatic dancers are black snakes undulating through the glossy green leaves.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Feasting Hub
node.description: Hexagonal pieces of slate have been selected and tiled over the ground at the hub to form a radiating mantra of color that draws the eye inexorably from the pale beige slate of the rim to the deep ebony of the center.
Massive torches placed at each cardinal point send a sooty light flickering over the slate mosaic tiling over the ground of the hub, drawing all attention to the deep ebony of the center.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Ring Commons
node.description: Lush myrtle surrounds the central plaza in a broad collar, offering a natural cushion for the comfort of any observer of the rituals performed at the hub. The feet of ecstatic dancers have tramped a trio of paths around the ring, forming a strangely pleasing braided pattern of brown embossed among the glossy green leaves.

Light thrown from the sooty torches blazing about the hub wavers over the lush myrtle of the commons ringing the central area, creating an illusion that the trampled braided paths made by the feet of ecstatic dancers are black snakes undulating through the glossy green leaves.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Ring Commons
node.description: Lush myrtle surrounds the central plaza in a broad collar, offering a natural cushion for the comfort of any observer of the rituals performed at the hub. The feet of ecstatic dancers have tramped a trio of paths around the ring, forming a strangely pleasing braided pattern of brown embossed among the glossy green leaves.

Light thrown from the sooty torches blazing about the hub wavers over the lush myrtle of the commons ringing the central area, creating an illusion that the trampled braided paths made by the feet of ecstatic dancers are black snakes undulating through the glossy green leaves.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Ring Commons
node.description: Lush myrtle surrounds the central plaza in a broad collar, offering a natural cushion for the comfort of any observer of the rituals performed at the hub. The feet of ecstatic dancers have tramped a trio of paths around the ring, forming a strangely pleasing braided pattern of brown embossed among the glossy green leaves.

Light thrown from the sooty torches blazing about the hub wavers over the lush myrtle of the commons ringing the central area, creating an illusion that the trampled braided paths made by the feet of ecstatic dancers are black snakes undulating through the glossy green leaves.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Cloud Ascent
node.description: An imposing broad stair rises into the scanty mist, the arch of each sun-bleached basalt step shaped to the contour of the steep mountain. Crouched to one side of the base of the steps, a sturdy stone lodge tucks neatly into the mountain, appearing more a natural fall of the native rock than a planned structure.

A broad stair arches into the contour of the steep mountain, ascending like an apparition into the blackness above. Crouched to one side of the base of the steps, a sturdy stone lodge tucks neatly into the mountain, appearing more a natural fall of the native rock than a planned structure.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Ring Commons
node.description: Lush myrtle surrounds the central plaza in a broad collar, offering a natural cushion for the comfort of any observer of the rituals performed at the hub. The feet of ecstatic dancers have tramped a trio of paths around the ring, forming a strangely pleasing braided pattern of brown embossed among the glossy green leaves.

Light thrown from the sooty torches blazing about the hub wavers over the lush myrtle of the commons ringing the central area, creating an illusion that the trampled braided paths made by the feet of ecstatic dancers are black snakes undulating through the glossy green leaves.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Sweet Bay Commons
node.description: The conical grass hut claiming this corner of the clearing broods with a smug odiousness, holding its secrets to itself. The barren ground surrounding the hut is in sharp contrast to the rich spicy scent wafting from the shady branches of the bay tree.

In this dark corner of the clearing, the conical grass hut claiming ownership broods with a smug odiousness, holding its secrets to itself. The smoldering embers in the fire pit paint the barren surroundings in a weak illumination as the rich spice of the bay tree drifts poignantly through the dim light.

node.name: Abandoned Hut
node.description: Dark and nearly empty, the hut has patches of both old and new wood, as if it has gone through extensive repairs in the recent past. Thick boards are lashed to the back wall, closing what must have been a gaping hole in the back wall. The reed walls are reinforced with braided vines and planks of wood, covering up any gaps and peepholes that may have once existed.

node.name: Storage Hut
node.description: Sharp and with a coppery scent, the air in here seems to have coagulated in the heat. Bowls full of blood stand under animal bodies as they hang from pole racks in various stages of being dressed. A small knife, its grip maroon with dried blood, lies thrown on the floor. Pelts lie stacked in a huge basket in the corner and another basket holds entrails.

node.name: Villager's Hut
node.description: Order and purpose are evident here, created by habits refined during a lifetime of leading men in battle. Sleeping mats, tied in a bundle, have been stacked against the back wall. A large chest and an empty wall rack provide storage for weapons and armor when the residents are home.

node.name: Gai'y'rak'saar'adu, Ruins of the Heggarangi
node.description: Screened by the towering blackthorn bush, the smoldering ruins of a log lodge lie in the clearing, and the only thing left standing is a forbidding totem carved from an oiled black wood. The broken remains of a beaded doorway tied with feathers lie scattered underneath the splayed logs, which block all passage eastward. Hasty fires started inside the destroyed lodge have hidden the secrets of the place forever, reduced to mere ashes.

node.name: Villager's Hut
node.description: Half this hut is filled with piles of pelts, baskets of beads, fluttering feathers and assorted clay pottery cordoned off behind a thick vine net. A rumpled plaited palm sleeping pad disturbs the neat pattern left in the dirt by a besom of sweetbay leaves leaning against the netting. Far against the back wall, a hastily covered bowl reveals a silvery glint.

node.name: Stick in the Sand, Counter
node.description: A bamboo counter stands diagonally along a well-trodden path in the sand, linking the exit and a seating area off to the west. Oversized skewers hang from the ceiling, each adorned with colorful bits of cloth, each painted to resemble bits of fruit, meat, and vegetables.

node.name: Stick in the Sand, Seating Area
node.description: Mismatched tables, chairs, rugs, and blankets circle a fire pit sunken into the sand in the middle of this small area. A colorful cloth is stretched overhead, providing some shelter from the elements while letting the smoke filter through, and the sides are left open allowing a gentle sea breeze and the sounds of the island to fill the air.

node.name: Rushing River, Penninsula
node.description: Deep, thick, green grass spreads out, fed and cooled by the encompassing water that rushes down the river, which loops around in a wide path to create the penninsula. Park-like and serene, the lazily winding river appears to be the perfect location for swimming.

node.name: Rushing River, Eastern Point
node.description: The rushing water flows steadily as it lazily travels through the vegetation, wending its way around trees and other obstacles. A large arrangement of rocks is piled up in the center of the river, blocking any further progress south, though the rocks are wide enough to let the rushing water past.

node.name: Rushing River
node.description: The rippling water makes a constant roar as it rushes past, creating rapids near either bank while staying rather less treacherous in the center of the river. Several trees constantly shed leaves into the water, which get tossed and tumbled about as soon as they hit the waiting stones. The water continues flowing in from the southwest at a steady rate.

node.name: Rushing River
node.description: Numerous sharp rocks lining both banks makes this section of the river rather treacherous, although it is relatively calm in the very center. The water continues rushing in from the southwest, making whitecaps as it passes the numerous rocks.

node.name: Rushing River
node.description: A single enormous boulder sitting on one bank narrows the river considerably, although it widens again afterward. The water continues rushing in from the west, making whitecaps as it passes the boulder.

node.name: Rushing River
node.description: Numerous birds sit in the numerous trees that line either side of the winding river, watching the water with intense curiosity. A faint breeze stirs ripples in the river, especially in the center where the current is the most invisible. The water continues rushing in from the west at a steady pace.

node.name: Rushing River
node.description: Faint ripples constantly bounce back and forth across the surface of the water, which is otherwise relatively still in this section of the river. The current continues flowing from the southwest, making its way through the deep water.

node.name: Rushing River
node.description: Faint ripples constantly bounce back and forth across the surface of the water, which is otherwise relatively still in this section of the river. The current continues flowing from the south, making its way through the deep water.

node.name: Rushing River
node.description: The water is frothy white from the tumbling river, and weeping willow trees grow by the river, brushing its surface with their branches. The current continues from the southwest, while deeper water can be seen down below. Through the water, the outline of large freshwater clams are easily seen lining the bottom.

node.name: Rushing River
node.description: The water is frothy white from the tumbling river, and occasional fish can be seen swimming in the steady flow. The current continues from the southwest, while deeper water can be seen down below. Through the water, the outline of large freshwater clams are easily seen lining the bottom.

node.name: Rushing River, Bend
node.description: The water is frothy white from the tumbling river, while large willow trees line the bank on both sides. The current continues from the southwest, while deeper water can be seen down below. Through the water, the outline of large freshwater clams are easily seen lining the bottom.

node.name: Rushing River, Underwater
node.description: The warm blue water is clean and clear here, and some small orange fish swim gently by. Tiny crabs crawl over the colorful pebbles lining the bottom.

node.name: Rushing River, Underwater
node.description: The warm blue water is clean and clear here, and some small black fish swim gently by. Several small openings in the bottom of the riverbed create steady streams of bubbles that rises gently upward.

node.name: Rushing River, Underwater
node.description: The warm blue water is clean and clear here, and some small transparent fish swim gently by. Nearby, several dark rocks provide shelter for some of the tiny fish to hide in.

node.name: Rushing River, Underwater
node.description: The warm blue water is clean and clear here, and some small red fish swim gently by. Tiny green plants grow from the river bottom, straining upward to catch whatever sunlight they can through the water.

node.name: Rushing River, Bend
node.description: The water is frothy white from the tumbling river, while deep green vegetation lines the bank on both sides. The current continues from the southeast, while deeper water can be seen down below. Through the water, the outline of large river clams are barely visible.

node.name: Rushing River, Underwater
node.description: The warm blue water is clean and clear here, and some small yellow fish swim gently by. Small pebbles line the bottom of the river, creating a soft rainbow of muted colors.

node.name: Rushing River, Bend
node.description: Large stones and boulders line both banks, deposited here by the slow but steady force of the ever-moving water. The current flows in from the east, lazily bending around trees and other obstacles.

node.name: Rushing River, Underwater
node.description: The icy blue water is clean and clear here, and some small blue fish swim gently by.

node.name: Rushing River
node.description: Large stones and boulders line both banks, deposited here by the slow but steady force of the ever-moving water. The current flows in from the northeast, making a steady sound that sounds like a soft roar.

node.name: Rushing River, Underwater
node.description: The icy blue water is clean and clear here, and some small green fish swim gently by.

node.name: Rushing River
node.description: Large stones and boulders line both banks, deposited here by the slow but steady force of the ever-moving water. The current flows in from the northeast, creating small whitecaps along the river rocks.

node.name: Rushing River
node.description: Large stones and boulders line both banks, deposited here by the slow but steady force of the ever-moving water. The current flows in from the east, slowly dragging westward toward a fallen willow tree that fully spans the river.

node.name: Rushing River, Below the Fallen Willow
node.description: The eastern end of a fallen willow tree dangles in the water, creating a heavy maze of branches and leaves to the west. A clear passage just past the willow tree leads upward, along with the promise of fresh air.

node.name: Rushing River, Below the Fallen Willow
node.description: The branches of a fallen willow tree nearly cover the entire surface of the water. Many of them dangle into the water, creating a bit of an underwater maze to navigate through them. Here under the water the current is nearly still, and the tunnel continues eastward toward the end of the willow tree.

node.name: Rushing River, Below the Fallen Willow
node.description: The branches of a fallen willow tree nearly cover the entire surface of the water. Nearby, the roots of the fallen tree hang heavily in the water, making tiny trails of mud as the water flows past. Deep under the water, the current is nearly still, and a tunnel through the branches is clearly visible to the east.

node.name: Rushing River
node.description: An enormous willlow tree has fallen over in a way that fully spans the river, and its tangled branches completely block the waterway. The log appears half rotten, and would likely not hold the weight of someone trying to climb it. An underwater route is visible below the tree's long and tangled branches.

node.name: Rushing River
node.description: Heavy vegetation brushes the surface of the lapping water, draping down from either side of the riverbank. Crystal clear water makes its way to the ocean, flowing over rocks near the banks and more lazily in the center. The river continues rushing in from the southeast.

node.name: Rushing River
node.description: Heavy vegetation brushes the surface of the lapping water, draping down from either side of the riverbank. Crystal clear water makes its way to the ocean, flowing over rocks near the banks and more lazily in the center. The river continues rushing in from the northeast.

node.name: Rushing River
node.description: Heavy vegetation brushes the surface of the lapping water, draping down from either side of the riverbank. Crystal clear water makes its way to the ocean, flowing over rocks near the banks and more lazily in the center. The river continues rushing in from the east.

node.name: Rushing River
node.description: Though the water appears to be almost still in the center of the river, small eddies and whitecaps near the banks show that a steady current is constantly flowing. The rushing river flows from the northeast, streaming at a steady pace.

node.name: Rushing River
node.description: Though the water appears to be almost still in the center of the river, small eddies and whitecaps near the banks show that a steady current is constantly flowing. The rushing river flows from the north, streaming at a steady pace.

node.name: Rushing River
node.description: Though the water appears to be almost still in the center of the river, small eddies and whitecaps near the banks show that a steady current is constantly flowing. The rushing river flows from the northwest, streaming at a steady pace.

node.name: Rushing River, Southern Point
node.description: A combination of the soft winds and the frigid water make for a chilly, yet refreshing swim. The rushing river flows from the north, streaming at a steady pace. To the south, a barrier of rocks blocks any possibility of trying to swim downriver.

node.name: Rushing River, Dangerous Shortcut
node.description: The freezing blue water is fairly easy to see through, even while swimming below hard-packed frozen ice. The underwater shortcut continues south.

node.name: Rushing River, Dangerous Shortcut
node.description: More a tangle of dirt-free roots than anything deliberately dug, a narrow passage makes its way through a small underwater tunnel. The warm blue water is fairly easy to see through, and is dimly lit from either end. Water flows into the almost claustrophobic tunnel from the south.

node.name: Rushing River, Dangerous Shortcut
node.description: More a tangle of dirt-free roots than anything deliberately dug, a narrow passage makes its way through a small underwater tunnel. The warm blue water is fairly easy to see through, and is dimly lit from either end. Water flows into the almost claustrophobic tunnel from the south.

node.name: Rushing River, Dangerous Shortcut
node.description: More a tangle of dirt-free roots than anything deliberately dug, a narrow passage makes its way through a small underwater tunnel. The warm blue water is fairly easy to see through, and is dimly lit from either end. Water flows into the almost claustrophobic tunnel from the southeast.

node.name: Rushing River, Dangerous Shortcut
node.description: More a tangle of dirt-free roots than anything deliberately dug, a narrow passage makes its way through a small underwater tunnel. The warm blue water is fairly easy to see through, and is dimly lit from either end. Water flows into the almost claustrophobic tunnel from the east.

node.name: Rushing River, Dangerous Shortcut
node.description: More a tangle of dirt-free roots than anything deliberately dug, a narrow passage makes its way through a small underwater tunnel. The warm blue water is fairly easy to see through, and is dimly lit from either end. Water flows into the almost claustrophobic tunnel from the southeast.

node.name: Rushing River, Dangerous Shortcut
node.description: More a tangle of dirt-free roots than anything deliberately dug, a narrow passage makes its way through a small underwater tunnel. The warm blue water is fairly easy to see through, and light filters in from above. An opening in the roots above offers a passage out of the tunnel.

node.name: Rushing River, Dangerous Shortcut
node.description: The end of the tunnel through the roots comes to an abrupt halt, with the opening offering safe passage upward.

node.name: Rushing River, Underwater
node.description: The warm blue water is clean and clear here, and some small purple fish swim gently by. A red slick algae grows on the bottom, lightly coating the colorful pebbles scattered along it.

node.name: Wise Weapons, Annex
node.description: A simple bamboo lean-to with a split log floor allows for an extension of the showroom. A large mahogany table displays the expanded selection.

node.name: The Gilded Wave, Vault
node.description: An intricately painted mural depicting each of the moons in all of their phases covers the walls, resting upon a velvety black backdrop bearing fanciful renderings of the constellations. In one corner of the room, a shimmering moongate is blocked off by barricades guarded by large Gor'Togs.

node.name: Found Treasures
node.description: A jumble of items, from bits of broken jewelry to colorful beach bags, hang all over the interior of this small hut. Set in to the back wall, a door painted boldly with the words KEEP OUT.

node.name: The Underground
node.description: Dug out from the rock and dirt, this underground vault is cool all year round. Lamps hang from the ceiling, providing relatively little light for perusing the wares. A large sign hangs on a root sticking out from the back wall, just over a table carved from a granite boulder.

node.name: Chieftain's House
node.description: The sensual aroma of smoky incense lingers in this spacious area, notable for its lack of furnishings. The bold motif of the beaded curtain that covers the exit continues, spanning the walls in a continuous mural formed from the skillful placement and manipulation of the thousands of teeth of sacrificial creatures. At the rear of the room, a locked and barred door blocks off entrance to the rest of the house.

node.name: Tropicats, Front Room
node.description: The smell of cats hangs heavily in this small shop, mingling with the occasional whiff of catnip. Slender walkways line the wood panel walls near the ceiling, with occasional larger platforms holding bowls, pillowy beds, and small toys. Above a door behind the counter is a hole through which the walkway passes. Large windows are set on each side of the exit, adorned with billowing cat-print curtains.

node.name: Seastar Curios, Foyer
node.description: Freshly dried bamboo stalks are tightly tethered together with braided hemp to form the small building, while an array of seashells and various finds hung upon the walls provides a bit of decoration. A multitude of blue-green gaethzen seastars hang overhead, casting a soft ocean-colored hue over the pedestals, counters, and various surfaces below.

node.name: Seastar Curios, Apparel
node.description: Sheer blue and green silks drape the tethered bamboo walls, creating a small parlor-like atmosphere with a trio of brass lanterns that hang overhead highlighting the wares below. A pair of weathered rattan chairs surround a small cart in a far corner.

node.name: Seastar Curios, Vault
node.description: Faded sea nets drape the ceiling and walls of the small room, each entangled with bits of driftwood, seashells, and dried sea kelp. Casting a soft golden hue upon the trio of tables below, a marbled gaethzen orb encased in pewter vining dangles overhead.

node.name: Seastar Curios, Back Room
node.description: An array of makeshift racks surround the bamboo walls, each displaying a variety of wares, lit by a trio of lanterns overhead. A large threadbare rug covers the rough hewn plank flooring, while a faded tapestry decorates a far will with image of battling warriors.

node.name: Shore to Floor, Beach
node.description: A cool seabreeze flows across the top of the tower, open to a brilliant view of the sparkling waters of the Jalren'rae'Taisidon lagoon on one side and the lush jungle of the island on the other. Under an umbrella rests a blanket covered in a tropical flower print, on which rests goods for sale. Sand covers the floor, ending at a blue-painted pool around a spiral stairway leading down into the tower.

node.name: Shore to Floor, Coral Reef
node.description: Blue glass lanterns hang in various lengths from the ceiling, each one with a slowly turning paper mobile around it, giving the light cast a flickering, watery effect. Found objects are stacked around the curved walls -- tubes, bottles, and bowls -- all painted to resemble the various coral and creatures in a reef. In one corner, some cavernous rocks frame steps leading further downwards into darkness.

node.name: Shore to Floor, Seafloor
node.description: The air is cold here to the point where breathing becomes more of an effort. Eerie green light oozes about the area, not quite illuminating large shadowy objects lurking just on the edge of its reach. A rusted metal frame supports rotting driftwood in the most illuminated spot in the room, forming a table displaying wares for sale.

node.name: Tastelessly Tacky, Island Division
node.description: Colorful batiks drape in loose swags from the rafters, clashing vividly with the purple and yellow painted walls and floors. The tables containing the merchandise are daubed with large spots of colors over the bare wood of the furniture. Gilt hooks on the walls hold glass lanterns that illuminate the room.

node.name: Safari Club, Alterer's Lounge
node.description: The thatched ceiling rises high up above a smooth floor crafted from beautiful tropical hardwoods. Benches, carved from the same woods as the floor, sit around the perimeter of the room. Worktables are set around the room, allowing for alterers to work on their items.
